description: As of stable/liberty there is a configuration option named 'fake_call', defined in nova/network/manager.py, and has been moved in Mitaka to nova/conf/network.py as part of the config option cleanup. Running grep on this name shows no usage of this option anywhere in the nova code base. Since it is not used, it should be removed.
title: Configuration option 'fake_call' is not used

comments.content: As of stable/liberty there is a configuration option named 'fake_call', defined in nova/network/manager.py, and has been moved in Mitaka to nova/conf/network.py as part of the config option cleanup. Running grep on this name shows no usage of this option anywhere in the nova code base. Since it is not used, it should be removed.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ed-leafe

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
